title: Xaviersobased Announces Tour, Shares New “Worth It” Video: Watch
summary: The New York rapper is playing North American shows in support of the Once More EP

title: Wednesday Share New “Townies” Video: Watch
summary: Lance Bangs directed the music video for the Bleeds song

title: Morrissey Cancels Concerts as Canadian Man Is Charged With Online Death Threats Against Him
summary: Authorities have charged a 26-year-old with uttering threats to cause death or bodily harm after he allegedly posted on Bluesky about wanting to shoot Morrissey at one of the singer’s shows

title: Kneecap Banned From Canada
summary: The group said it would take legal action against the Canadian politician who, in announcing the ban, accused Kneecap of advocating for political violence and antisemitism

title: D4vd Cancels Tour After Investigators Identify Body in His Tesla as Missing Teenage Girl
summary: The singer played a handful of shows after Celeste Rivas’ body was found, but he ceased touring after her identity was made public
